Conjuration 6

Locust Swarms
Ritual
N3
spell id [id]: 816
effect number [effect_number]: 42
damage [damage]: 8
range [provrange]: 5 provinces
number of effects [nreff]: 1
gems required [gemcost]: 8N
Affect Province with Anonymous Event:Locust Swarms
Cannot target geo mask : (Small Province)
The caster unleashes swarms of locusts upon a province. The locusts will cause panic, consume crops and cause the loss of taxes. The swarms will appear as a natural event.
Unrest +20, Income -50%. Reported as a random event.
